title: GroupManager 设置权限的一些问题
txt_content:
我修改了一下 groups.yml 里的内容 问题1 然后用个随意账号登录都是显示 无法与***互换 然后 问题2 使用GroupManager一些命令 一直都显示 All commands are locked due to an error.Check the log and then try a'/manload'.   弄了很多遍一直都是这样  无论怎样  只要一改 groups.yml 都会出问题   要怎么弄啊


# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default3:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&9贵族'
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5VIP'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&1教皇''&4腐竹'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: false
        
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c总理'
      suffix: ''
  Default1:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&e无产阶级'
      suffix: ''
  Default2:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&a资产阶级'
      suffix: ''

replies.txt_content:

yml这个东西要求格式究极变态     用记事本等其他东西改就是作死、、

w44225769 发表于 2014-8-7 17:53
请下载notepad++   这个软件 右键文件使用notepad++  编辑

yml这个东西要求格式究极变态     用记事本等其 ...
其实我就是用notepad++改的
